languages.text: "Ты глянь: измываются над ним как могут. А я думала, что это булыжник у нас бессердечный".

traits.locale_text: "Ты глянь: измываются над ним как могут. А я думала, что это булыжник у нас бессердечный".

languages.text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."
languages.original_text: "Ты глянь: измываются над ним как могут. А я думала, что это булыжник у нас бессердечный".

traits.locale_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."
"Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."
"Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."
"Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."
"Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."
"Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

languages.text: 「可哀そうな彼を好き放題に踏みにじってるじゃないの。我らが堅物氏には心がないと思ってたのにね」
languages.original_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

traits.locale_text: 「可哀そうな彼を好き放題に踏みにじってるじゃないの。我らが堅物氏には心がないと思ってたのにね」

languages.text: "Wie gnadenlos Ihr auf den armen Mann eintretet. Und ich dachte, unser Spielverderber hier wäre herzlos."
languages.original_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

traits.locale_text: "Wie gnadenlos Ihr auf den armen Mann eintretet. Und ich dachte, unser Spielverderber hier wäre herzlos."

languages.text: « On dirait que vous prenez plaisir à remuer le couteau dans la plaie. Moi qui croyais que c'était notre rabat-joie qui n'avait pas de cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

traits.locale_text: « On dirait que vous prenez plaisir à remuer le couteau dans la plaie. Moi qui croyais que c'était notre rabat-joie qui n'avait pas de cœur. »

languages.text: «Hay que ver cómo ningunea al pobre hombre. Y yo que pensaba que el aguafiestas era el que no tenía corazón».
languages.original_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

traits.locale_text: «Hay que ver cómo ningunea al pobre hombre. Y yo que pensaba que el aguafiestas era el que no tenía corazón».

languages.text: “你看看你，你的话简直就像是从那个可怜人身上踩过去一样。我还以为不长心的人只有泼冷水大师一个呢。”
languages.original_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

traits.locale_text: “你看看你，你的话简直就像是从那个可怜人身上踩过去一样。我还以为不长心的人只有泼冷水大师一个呢。”

languages.text: "Zavallının üzerine gitme artık. Güya oyunbozanı kalpsiz bilirdim..."
languages.original_text: "Look at you walk all over the poor man. And here I thought our killjoy was the one without a heart."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallının üzerine gitme artık. Güya oyunbozanı kalpsiz bilirdim..."
